item1: Maintenance of bin location usage status
item2: When the bin location usage status is found to be incorrect, you can modify the bin location usage status
item4: Incorrect situation of bin location usage status
item5: Query conditions for bin location information
item7: If there is no eligible location data, the system will prompt that there is no available bin location information. The user can run the Data Inquire-> Q090 Location Usage Status Query job to query the bin location data and status; or select the specified bin location number
item8: Enter the inventory details query conditions and click Query to query the bin location data
item10: The user can execute Data Inquire-> Q090 Location Usage Status Query to query the bin location data to confirm that the modified data is correct, or confirm it in step 1
